question: I was recently put on metformin, I thought it was for diabetes, but the recently found out i did not have it. The only thing my doctor said was that I have really low good cholesterol, Why would he put me on this? Im very confused and i need an answer, Ive been reading alot of people have been taking this for weight loss, im 17 years old, im a girl, and im 5'5 and i weigh 197 lbs, anyone think im on this for weighing so much at only 17, im not really that big im just a little thicker than others,
title: metformin
